timeline.bodyText: we should stop doing explicit waits. cy.get have an implicit wait until the element shows up. There is a timeout that you can override on the get method.

replies.bodyText:
Agreed. That said, I tried adding an implicit wait to the cy.get here, and for some reason this is not working. I was able to remove the second explicit wait though, as well as a wait in the deployment of the pipeline.
I added a to-do to comment to further investigate this and other oddities in this test later.
